title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 895.3 - Assigned classifications and standards of quality and purity
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 895.3 - Assigned classifications and standards of quality and purity

State Regulations
(a) The
classifications and standards of quality and purity which are hereby assigned
to all fresh surface waters within the Onondaga Lake drainage basin are as set
forth in table I. (b) When the
waters of that portion of Onondaga Lake which are assigned to class B herein
shall have been so improved as to comply with the standards of quality
specified for class B, the Water Pollution Control Board at that time will give
consideration to reclassification of additional areas of Onondaga Lake to class
B. In respect to any other waters described in table I, whenever their
qualities have been improved so as to comply with the standards assigned to
them herein, the Water Pollution Control Board, upon request, will give
consideration to their possible reclassification to a higher class. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
895.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
